title: Save Vanra
content:
ve Vanra Notes & Tips

There is a bug that occasionally happens where the fake Captain Grisly (called Captain Grizly) spawns with 0/122 HP. When that happens, after she reveals herself as Ethel, there will be no follow-up dialogue triggering the event where she goes to the basement. Should this happen, heal her beforehand to any number above 0 and the dialogue will trigger. (She will still spawn with full health during the actual combat.)
